data.name: Fr retake Tortuga
data.desc: Fr Gov of Tortuga, at first under commission of Gov of Jam, issues letters of marque to privateers, thereby falling afoul of Jam, after which he takes Tortuga for France, despite an attempt by Jam and Arundell to keep Tortuga under Eng
data.agents_nsp0: Gov Jérémie Deschamps, Sieur de la Place
data.agents_nsp1: Gov Col Doyley, James Arundell, Barth. Cock
data.prim_n: Rawl MSS A. 347 ff 31, 36 / SP 94/47 [Deposition of Sir C. Lyttleton] / Terte 3 135-138
data.note: Tortuga ceded to Fr WIC by Fr Gov of Tortuga in Nov 1664 /v Haring /Dutertre [missg]
